001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.qualifyingEvent;
002
003import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.PumpStateSupplier;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.ControlIQInfoRequestBuilder;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.CurrentBatteryRequestBuilder;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.IOBRequestBuilder;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.LastBolusStatusRequestBuilder;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlertStatusRequest;
013import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.BasalIQSettingsRequest;
014import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.BasalIQStatusRequest;
015import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CGMAlertStatusRequest;
016import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CGMStatusRequest;
017import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ControlIQSleepScheduleRequest;
018import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentBasalStatusRequest;
019import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentBolusStatusRequest;
020import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest;
021import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ExtendedBolusStatusRequest;
022import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.HomeScreenMirrorRequest;
023import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.InsulinStatusRequest;
024import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LastBGRequest;
025import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest;
026import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ProfileStatusRequest;
027import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ReminderStatusRequest;
028import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.TempRateRequest;
029import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.TimeSinceResetRequest;
030
031import org.json.JSONObject;
032
033import java.util.HashSet;
034import java.util.Set;
035import java.util.function.Supplier;
036import java.util.stream.Collectors;
037
038/**
039 * A list of all QualifyingEvents which can be sent from the pump. For some events, a set of request
040 * messages which can be sent (via `sendPumpCommand`) to receive more information about the event
041 * which just occurred, in logic matching the Tandem mobile app, is included. To get these
042 * instantiated request messages, you can invoke:
043 *     QualifyingEvent.groupSuggestedHandlers(qualifyingEvents)
044 *
045 * Note that if t:connect app connection sharing is enabled and the t:connect app is running,
046 * you can use enableSendSharedConnectionResponseMessages and get the response from these callbacks
047 * for free, without duplicating requests.
048 */
049public enum QualifyingEvent {
050    ALERT(1, ImmutableSet.of(
051            AlertStatusRequest::new)),
052    ALARM(2, ImmutableSet.of(
053            AlarmStatusRequest::new)),
054    REMINDER(4, ImmutableSet.of(
055            ReminderStatusRequest::new)),
056    MALFUNCTION(8, ImmutableSet.of(
057            MalfunctionStatusRequest::new)),
058    CGM_ALERT(16, ImmutableSet.of(
059            CGMAlertStatusRequest::new)),
060    HOME_SCREEN_CHANGE(32, ImmutableSet.of(
061            CurrentBasalStatusRequest::new,
062            CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest::new,
063            HomeScreenMirrorRequest::new,
064            () -> ControlIQInfoRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
065    PUMP_SUSPEND(64, ImmutableSet.of(
066            InsulinStatusRequest::new,
067            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()))),
068    PUMP_RESUME(128, ImmutableSet.of(
069            InsulinStatusRequest::new,
070            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
071            CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest::new,
072            ProfileStatusRequest::new)),
073    TIME_CHANGE(256, ImmutableSet.of(
074            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
075            CGMStatusRequest::new,
076            TimeSinceResetRequest::new)),
077    BASAL_CHANGE(512, ImmutableSet.of(
078            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
079            HomeScreenMirrorRequest::new,
080            CurrentBasalStatusRequest::new,
081            TempRateRequest::new)),
082    BOLUS_CHANGE(1024, ImmutableSet.of(
083            CurrentBolusStatusRequest::new,
084            ExtendedBolusStatusRequest::new,
085            () -> LastBolusStatusRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
086    IOB_CHANGE(2048, ImmutableSet.of(
087            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()))),
088    EXTENDED_BOLUS_CHANGE(4096, ImmutableSet.of(
089            ExtendedBolusStatusRequest::new,
090            () -> LastBolusStatusRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
091    PROFILE_CHANGE(8192, ImmutableSet.of(
092            ProfileStatusRequest::new)),
093    BG(16384, ImmutableSet.of(
094            LastBGRequest::new)),
095    CGM_CHANGE(32768, ImmutableSet.of(
096            CGMStatusRequest::new,
097            CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest::new,
098            HomeScreenMirrorRequest::new)),
099    BATTERY(65536, ImmutableSet.of(
100            () -> CurrentBatteryRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
101    BASAL_IQ(131072, ImmutableSet.of(
102            BasalIQSettingsRequest::new)),
103    REMAINING_INSULIN(262144, ImmutableSet.of(
104            InsulinStatusRequest::new)),
105    SUSPEND_COMM(524288),
106    ACTIVE_SEGMENT_CHANGE(1048576, ImmutableSet.of(
107            ProfileStatusRequest::new)),
108    BASAL_IQ_STATUS(2097152, ImmutableSet.of(
109            BasalIQSettingsRequest::new,
110            BasalIQStatusRequest::new)),
111    CONTROL_IQ_INFO(4194304, ImmutableSet.of(
112            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
113            () -> ControlIQInfoRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()),
114            ControlIQSleepScheduleRequest::new)),
115    CONTROL_IQ_SLEEP(8388608, ImmutableSet.of(
116            ControlIQSleepScheduleRequest::new)),
117    BOLUS_PERMISSION_REVOKED(2147483648L),
118
119    ;
120    private final long id;
121    private final Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> suggestedHandlers;
122    QualifyingEvent(long id) {
123        this.id = id;
124        this.suggestedHandlers = new HashSet<>();
125    }
126
127    QualifyingEvent(long id, Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> suggestedHandlers) {
128        this.id = id;
129        this.suggestedHandlers = suggestedHandlers;
130    }
131
132    public final long getId() {
133        return id;
134    }
135
136    public final Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> getSuggestedHandlers() {
137        return suggestedHandlers;
138    }
139
140    public static Set<QualifyingEvent> fromBitmask(long bitmask) {
141        Set<QualifyingEvent> ret = new HashSet<>();
142        for (QualifyingEvent e : values()) {
143            if ((bitmask & e.getId()) != 0) {
144                ret.add(e);
145            }
146        }
147        return ret;
148    }
149
150    public static Set<QualifyingEvent> fromRawBtBytes(byte[] raw) {
151        return fromBitmask(Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0));
152    }
153
154    public static Set<? extends Message> groupSuggestedHandlers(Set<QualifyingEvent> events) {
155        Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> messages = new HashSet<>();
156        for (QualifyingEvent e : events) {
157            messages.addAll(e.suggestedHandlers);
158        }
159        return messages.stream().map(Supplier::get).collect(Collectors.toSet());
160    }
161
162    public static int toBitmask(QualifyingEvent...states) {
163        int bitmask = 0;
164        for (QualifyingEvent e : states) {
165            bitmask |= e.getId();
166        }
167        return bitmask;
168    }
169
170    public String jsonToString() {
171        JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
172        obj.put("event", name());
173        return obj.toString(0);
174    }
175
176    public JSONObject asJsonObject() {
177        JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
178        obj.put("event", name());
179        return obj;
180    }
181
182}
